title: Chairman's125 Appeal

charity.name: St David's Hospice Care (Gwent and S. Powys)
charity.description:
St. David's Hospice Care provides free community-based hospice care to people with cancer or any other life threatening illness living in Gwent and Mid/South Powys. 
Your donations help us to provide the services that give patients a real choice about where  they spend their final days.

story:
Thanks for taking the time to visit my Just-Giving page.

﻿It's been a privilege to have been a Trustee of St David's Hospice Care, for just over 125 months, the latter part of which as Chairman. As such, I would like to get involved in the South Wales Argus 125 Appeal. St David's were enormously honoured when selected by this pillar of society to be the beneficiary of its appeal fund. Since the announcement last year, it has been a pleasure to read about the exploits of the people and organisations that have been raising funds through a variety of means. I am hoping to add a little more to the fund by appealing to all those people I have met over the nearly 50 years that I have lived, worked and played in the area. I am aspiring to get 125 people or organisations to donate a sum of money on the theme of '125', ideally £125 but £12.50 or £25 or any other permutation would be perfectly acceptable. All funds raised will be used to provide much needed and appreciated services throughout the area.

Other ways to donate:

  • You can 'Text to donate': Text Appe79 £5 to 70070
  • You can send a cheque made payable to 'St David's Hospice Care' to St David's Hospice Care, Blackett Avenue, Newport, NP20 6NH - Ref: 'Chairman's Appeal.
  • Or Call Geraint and donate over the phone on 01633 851042 (Monday to Friday between 09:00 - 17:00)

Donating through Just-Giving is simple, fast and totally secure. Your details are safe with Just-Giving - they'll never sell them on or send unwanted emails. Once you donate, they'll send your money directly to the charity. So it's the most efficient way to donate - saving time and cutting costs for the charity.
